mapper.insert: insert into sys_log (id, log_type, log_content, method, operate_type, request_param, ip, userid, username, cost_time, create_time) values( #{dto.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dto.logType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dto.logContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dto.method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dto.operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dto.requestParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dto.ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dto.userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dto.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dto.costTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dto.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
